data.actual_result: It does not jump to the message unless you click on the button itself
data.expected_result: It's supposed to jump even if you don't directly click on jump like how it is on stable
data.short_description: You can't jump to messages unless you click on the "jump" button itself compared to Stable/PTB
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to pins - Attempt to click anywhere on the message to jump - Observe it not jumping unless you click on "Jump" like on stable
